title: The Getty Family’s Trust Issues
excerpt: Heirs to an iconic fortune sought out a wealth manager who would assuage their progressive consciences. Now their dispute is exposing dynastic secrets.

title: Ten Ways Billionaires Avoid Taxes on an Epic Scale
excerpt: After a year of reporting on the tax machinations of the ultrawealthy, ProPublica spotlights the top tax-avoidance techniques that provide massive benefits to billionaires.

title: Do You Have to Pay Capital Gains Tax on a Home Sale?
excerpt: Capital gains taxes on real estate and property can be reduced or not assessed when you sell your home, up to certain tax limits, if you meet the requirements.
